subject: Re: first time with frank's box
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I use mine at home, in the basement, with the lights on. You don't have to go the "haunted" locations, spirits and entities are everywhere, and they travel, they will come to use if you announce you're doing EVP sesssions. Of course--I make my own boxes. 

 I don't see how a ouija is dangerous. 

 Frank-S
